topicTitle: Moonrakerone's TTT Mod App (about 8 months in the making?)

posts.postText:
1) What position are you applying for: TTT Mod.

2) Your age: 17, sir.

3) Your location: Colorado (USA, obviously) MST

4) Current In-Game Name: Moonrakerone [NNJG]

5) Steam ID & Link to your Steam Community Profile: http://steamcommunity.com/id/Moonrakerone/  STEAM_0:1:25064241

6) How did you find out about NNJG: Decided one day to play TTT, happened upon this one.

7) How long have you been involved with NNJG and/or Shadow's servers: Ummm, august of last year i believe, with a very large gap of three to four months.

8) What you can bring to the NNJG Team: (Web/Graphic Design, Lua/Other Coder, Moderation, Map Maker, etc.) Moderation...crappy mapping?

9) Why do you want to be part of the NNJG Team: Because it's awesome, i know most of the regulars, and i can handle the great responsibility that comes with mod.

10) Do you have any past experience with the position you're applying for: Nope, well VIP powers i suppose, and some extinct forum moderation.

11) Do you own a decent microphone, and do you frequently utilize it: Someone told me it was "awesome", so i guess it is. I use it a lot. A LOT A LOT.

12) Any other comments or information you can provide: I've been here for quite awhile, i know the rules pretty well, and i'm more than willing to learn how to be a decent moderator. I understand when mercy should be given, but also when enough is enough. I will be a bit less active as i'd prefer (High level classes demand sacrifice) but I'm usually on at weird hours on the weekends that are usually mod/admin-less. I'm working on recommends right now, give me a minute. :)


Recommends: http://www.dropbox.com/gallery/870345/1/Recommends?h=296fb3
(if this isn't an okay way to do this, let me know.)






HEY, UPDATE LOOK HERE LOOOOOK
9/16/11

I've been inactive as shit lately. BUT, after i kick some Extended Essay ass this weekend i'll be able to play at least 2/7 days of the week, but more likely 3 or 4.

I'm adding this because i see more people being denied, and i know i'm looking pretty bad being so inactive, but it's not that i want to be, and it won't be permanent. <3
Unfortunately, we are unable to accept your application at this time.
